# zendesk_group_memberships (Resource)

Provides a group membership resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/api-reference/ticketing/users/group_memberships/

resource "zendesk_group_memberships" "example" {
  user_id  = 12345
  group_id = 67890
  default  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group_id` (Number) The ID of the group.
- `user_id` (Number) The ID of the user.

### Optional

- `default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default group membership for the user. Defaults to `false`.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time the group membership was created.
- `updated_at` (String) The time the group membership was last updated.
- `url` (String) The API url of this group membership.

## Notes

- Group memberships are immutable. The `user_id` and `group_id` fields are marked as `ForceNew`, meaning any change to these fields will result in the resource being recreated.
